episodes.title: New Zealand MP David Parker on the Exclusive Brethren PBCC using private investigators - PBCC Leaks
FOUL-MOUTHED MEMBERS OF PLYMOUTH BRETHREN "CHRISTIAN" CHURCH
episodes.description:
https://linktr.ee/pbccleaks
Quentin McDermott, distinguished reporter from ABC News films quietly in a public Perth street and is promptly met by foul-mouthed members of the Plymouth Brethren Cult.
#pbccleaks
#plymouthbrethrenchristianchurch

episodes.title: PBCC CULT OFFERS PRIVATE EYE BLANK CHEQUE TO ABDUCT EX MEMBER - $150K FOR QUICK DELIVERY!
episodes.description:
https://linktr.ee/pbccleaks​​
Download Full Transcript here: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/n5ztb3f3q0nlws93mgczb/04-Feb-2021-PI-call.docx?dl=0&rlkey=pukcy34fdztp8eakurfiviso2
Listen To The Full Audio here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6oYH43XH3H0

The Exclusive Brethren, a.k.a the PBCC, claim to be a
"mainstream Christian church."
Led by Australian Bruce Hales, it's 53,000 members
donate vast sums of tax exempt money to the church's
"charitable trusts" every year.

Millions of those dollars are spent on aggressive lawyers and
Private Investigators to track, monitor and harass ex members who
escape the cult's coercive control.

The sheer scale of abuse has been kept out of the public eye
with intensive PR campaigns , lawsuits and political influence.

But now their luck has run out.

On 04 February 2021, a friend of ours, Dr. Kirat Singh, from Edmonton,
received a call from a Private Investigator working
for PBCC Members.

He was being paid $10,000/week by a manager of the church's
finance wing, "Universal Business Team" (UBT) to hunt down,
rob and kidnap PBCC escapee and outspoken critic, Richard Marsh.

In an intense phone call, the Private Investigator lifted the
curtain on a world of malice, sleaze and crime.

What follows is the audio of that call:

https://www.klattinvestigations.com/
https://www.prowestinvestigation.com/
https://www.zoominfo.com/p/Brad-Mitchell/46282247
https://www.change.org/p/uk-parliament-urgently-revoke-charitable-status-for-the-plymouth-brethren-christian-church
https://www.charitydata.ca/charity/christians-gospel-society/135437598RR0001/
https://www.stuff.co.nz/national/78573007/exclusive-brethrens-the-sect-with-millions-of-dollars-in-tax-breaks-whose-secretive-leader-tells-followers-to-drink-rat-poison
https://www.elections.ca/fin/oth/thi/advert/tp43/TP-0009_ecr.pdf
https://www.smh.com.au/national/exclusive-brethren-leader-bruce-hales-says-man-in-torment-should-kill-himself-20150918-gjpwpk.html
https://culteducation.com/group/910-exclusive-brethren/35233-exclusive-brethren-cult-leader-s-millionaire-son-accused-of-assault.html#:~:text=Two%20men%20have%20accused%20Gareth%20Hales%2C%20whose%20office,attempt%20to%20wrest%20a%20mobile%20phone%20from%20him
https://www.smh.com.au/national/exclusive-brethren-cult-leader-s-millionaire-son-accused-of-assault-20200120-p53t41.html
https://www.stuff.co.nz/national/crime/300181760/exclusive-brethren-mans-convictions-for-raping-assaulting-son-stand
